paper.title: Parameterized Verification of Multithreaded Software Libraries
paper.venue: Tools and Algorithms for Construction and Analysis of Systems
paper.abstract: The growing popularity of multi-threading has led to a great number of software libraries that support access by multiple threads. We present Local/Global Finite State Machines (LGFSMs) as a model for a certain class of multithreaded libraries. We have developed a tool called Beacon that does parameterized model checking of LGFSMs. We demonstrate the expressiveness of LGFSMs as models, and the effectiveness of Beacon as a model checking tool by (1) modeling a multithreaded memory manager Rockall developed at Microsoft Research as an LGFSM, and (2) using Beacon to check a critical safety property of Rockall.
